Vraag: What is encoding?
Antwoord: The process of converting information into another acceptable form for transmission.

Vraag: Common computer protocols must be in agreement and include which requirements?
Antwoord: Message encoding, formating and encapsulation, size, timing, delivery options

Vraag: What is a network protocol suite
Antwoord: A group of inter-related protocols necessary to perform a communication function, sets of rules that work together to help solve a problem,

Vraag: What does the OSI abbreviation stand for?
Who maintains TCP/IP
What are the TCP/IP Layers
Antwoord: (Top to bottom) Application, Transport, Internet, Network Access

Vraag: Wat betekent L op de foto?
Antwoord: Directly connected local interface IP address.

Vraag: Wat betekent S op de foto?
Geef het transportprotocol en poortnummer(s) van FTP.
Geef het transportprotocol en poortnummer(s) van SMTP.
Geef het transportprotocol en poortnummer(s) van DHCP.
Geef het transportprotocol en poortnummer(s) van IMAP.
Geef het transportprotocol en poortnummer(s) van POP3.

Waarvoor staan onderstaande velden van de TCP header?
Hoe is het Link-local IPv6 Address: fe80::fc99:47ff:fe75:cee0 gegenereerd?
Wat zijn de verschillen tussen Single-Mode Fiber en Multimode Fiber
What are the advantages and disadvantages of a Peer-to-Peer network
Antwoord: Advantages: easy to set up, less complex, lower cost. Disadvantages: no centralized administration, not as secure, not scalable, slower performance.

Vraag: What is an example of an Intermediary Network Device?
Antwoord: Examples include switches, wireless access points, routers, and firewalls.

Vraag: Wat is de term voor onderstaande diagram?
Wat is de term voor onderstaande diagram?
Welk type netwerk ontbreekt er op de plaats van de vraagtekens?
Antwoord: Geel: Local Area Network (LAN) | Roze: Wide Area Network (WAN)

Vraag: Wat zijn de eigenschappen van een Converged data network?
Antwoord: Converged networks can deliver data, voice, and video over the same network infrastructure. The network infrastructure uses the same set of rules and standards.

Vraag: What are four basic characteristics that Network Architectures need to address to meet user expectations?
Antwoord: Fault Tolerance, Scalability, Quality of Service, Security

Vraag: In what primary command mode is the switch with following prompt: Switch>
In what primary command mode is the switch with following prompt: Switch#
In what primary command mode is the switch with following prompt: Switch (config) #
In what primary command mode is the switch with following prompt: Switch (config-line) #
What is Line Configuration Mode used for?
Antwoord: Used to configure console and SSH.

Vraag: In what primary command mode is the switch with following prompt: Switch (config-if) #
What command is used to move from user EXEC mode to privilege EXEC mode?
What command is used to move into global configuration mode?
What commands are used to configure the name of a device?
What commands are used to secure user EXEC mode access?
What commands are used to secure privileged EXEC mode access?
What commands are used to secure VTY line access?
What commands are used to encrypt all plaintext passwords?
What commands are used to verify that the passwords on the device are encrypted?
What commands are used to create a banner message of the day on a network device?
Antwoord: banner motd #the message of the day# (global config command)

Vraag: What commands are used to save changes made to the running configuration to the startup configuration file?
Antwoord: copy running-config startup-config (privileged EXEC mode command)
